column2: Whether the state should allow the use of slaves.
Slaves will be allowed.\n§G+5§! Vassal Opinion\n§R+1%§! National Revolt Risk
Only slaves of conquered people will be allowed.
No slaves will be allowed.\n§G-1%§! National Revolt Risk\n§R-5§! Vassal Opinion
Whether the state should regulate the markets.
We will regulate the market.\n§G+62§! Days of Supply\n§R-0.4%§! Trade Income
They will regulate themselves with our help.
They will regulate themselves with little interference from the state.\n§G+0.4%§! Trade Income\n§R-62§! Days of Supply
Whether the state is allowed to resettle the population.
Resettlement will be allowed.\n§G+4%§! Levy Reinforcement Rate\n§R+1%§! National Revolt Risk
Only resettlement of conquered people will be allowed.
No resettlement will be allowed.\n§G-1%§! National Revolt Risk\n§R-4%§! Vassal Opinion
Whether the state should aid the population in time of need.

No welfare.
§G-4%§! Retinue Maintenence Cost
§G-4%§! Horde Maintenence Cost
§R+1%§! National Revolt Risk
Welfare for citizens only and in extreme circumstances.

Welfare for everybody.
§G-1%§! National Revolt Risk
§R+4%§! Retinue Maintenence Cost
§R+4%§! Horde Maintenence Cost
Whether the state should use imported goods.

We shall use local goods only.
§G+5%§! National Tax Modifier
§R-5%§! Build Time
§G-5%§! Local Build Time Modifier
We shall use imported goods in extreme circumstances.

We shall use imported goods whatever the costs.
§G+5%§! Build Time
§G+5%§! Local Build Time Modifier
§R-5%§! National Tax Modifier
Whether the state allows the population to open businesses.
Only nobles are allowed to open businesses.\n§G+5%§! Levy Size\n§R-5%§! National Tax Modifier
Only nobles and few wealthy lowborns are allowed to open businesses.
Everyone can open businesses.\n§G+5%§! National Tax Modifier\n§R-5%§! Levy Size
Whether the state should regulate the banks.
People should know what they signed.\n§G+0.1§! Monthly Wealth\n§R+1%§! National Revolt Risk
Banks are allowed to compete against each other.
A fair banking system for everyone.\n§G-1%§! National Revolt Risk\n§R-0.1§! Monthly Wealth
Whether the state should pay for the holidays granted to the citizens.
No holidays will be paid by the state.\n§G+4%§! National Tax Modifier\n§R+1%§! National Revolt Risk
Some holidays will be paid by the state.
All holidays will be paid by the state.\n§G-1%§! National Revolt Risk\n§R-4%§! National Tax Modifier
Whether the church should be focused in a particular role.
Zealots make for relentless soldiers.\n§G+4%§! Morale of Armies\n§R-0.04%§! Monthly Piety
The church will have a balanced role.
The church is meant for worship.\n§G+0.04%§! Monthly Piety\n§R-4%§! Morale of Armies
Whether the church should have the right to mark land as sacred.
We need all the land we can get.\n§G-5%§! Build Cost\n§R-5§! Same Religion Opinion
The church can only mark a few of them.
The church has full right to mark any land as sacred.\n§G+5§! Same Religion Opinion\n§R+5%§! Build Cost
Whether the church should restrict membership to nobles.
Membership will be restricted to nobles.\n§G+0.1%§! Monthly Prestige\n§R-4§! Same Religion Opinion
Membership will be open to everyone of the realm religion.
Membership will be open to everyone of any faith.\n§G+4§! Same Religion Opinion\n§R-0.1%§! Monthly Prestige
Whether the church should allow refugees.
The church will only take care of people from our realm.\n§G+4%§! National Tax Modifier\n§R-4§! General Opinion
The church will take care of people of our own culture and religion.
The church will take care of everybody.\n§G+4§! General Opinion\n§R-4%§! National Tax Modifier
Whether the church should be given a tithe.
The church will be given mandatory tithe.\n§G+0.1%§! Monthly Wealth\n§R-5§! Vassal Opinion
The church will collect whatever voluntary tithe is offered.
The church will be given a tithe from the state, and they will in turn distribute it to the people.\n§G+5§! Vassal Opinion\n§R-0.1%§! Monthly Wealth
Whether the church should make attendance mandatory.
Everyone is forced to go to church.\n§G+0.1%§! Monthly Piety\n§R-5§! Vassal Opinion
People are free to attend church at their own leisure, but must attend atleast once a week.
No attendance required.\n§G+5§! Vassal Opinion\n§R-0.1%§! Monthly Piety
Whether glossolalia is allowed in the realm.
Claiming that [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] is speaking via a mortal is banned.\n§G+5§! Infidel Opinion\n§R-0.1%§! Monthly Piety
Only the clergy is worthy to have [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] in them.
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] works in mysterious ways.\n§G+0.1%§! Monthly Piety\n§R-5§! Infidel Opinion
Whether conversion should be forced upon the citizens.
Everyone will convert to the [Root.Religion.GetName] religion or be put to the sword.\n§G+5§! Infidel Opinion\n§R-5§! Same Religion Opinion
While conversion is not mandatory...many rights will be stripped until they do so.
Everyone is free to follow whatever religion they wish.\n§G+5§! Same Religion Opinion\n§R-5§! Infidel Opinion
The ruler, the spouse, and any adult child of the ruler vote on who should be the heir. All children of the current ruler are valid candidates.
The ruler of the house chooses the heir. All children of the current ruler are valid candidates.
The citizens vote on who should be the next ruler. Councillors are all valid candidates.

The liege, ruler, and any other landed rulers with the theocracy government vote on who should be the next ruler. The Court Chaplain and any other landed rulers with the theocracy government are valid candidates.
The ruler, marshal, and commanders vote on who should be the next ruler. The marshal and commanders are all valid candidates.
All the members of the confederation vote on who should be the next President. All children of the current ruler are valid candidates.
